text: Wenhu Line is a line of the Taipei Metro in Taipei, Taiwan. Also called the Brown Line, this was the earliest line of the Taipei Metro. The line connects Taipei Zoo to Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center. You can transfer to the Tamsui-Xinyi Line at Daan, to the Bannan Line at Zhongxiao Fuxing or Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center station, or to the Songshan-Xindian Line at Nanjing Fuxing. In the future, transfers to the Circular Line can be made at Taipei Zoo or Jiannan Road station. The line currently consists of 24 stations with station codes from BR01 to BR24. == Stations == Code Station Name Travel time to previous station (s) Stop time at station (s) Date opened Transfer Districts English Chinese 動物園 n/a n/a 1996-03-28 Wenshan 木柵 67 25 1996-03-28 萬芳社區 47 25 1996-03-28 萬芳醫院 99 25 1996-03-28 辛亥 106 25 1996-03-28 麟光 124 25 1996-03-28 Xinyi, Daan 六張犁 72 25 1996-03-28 科技大樓 122 25 1996-03-28 Daan 大安 69 30 1996-03-28 忠孝復興 67 45 1996-03-28 南京復興 86 30 1996-03-28 Songshan 中山國中 66 25 1996-03-28 Zhongshan, Songshan 松山機場 142 25 2009-07-04 TSA Songshan 大直 172 25 2009-07-04 Zhongshan 劍南路 103 25 2009-07-04 西湖 110 25 2009-07-04 Neihu 港墘 65 25 2009-07-04 文德 72 25 2009-07-04 內湖 78 25 2009-07-04 大湖公園 71 25 2009-07-04 葫洲 121 25 2009-07-04 東湖 78 25 2009-07-04 南港軟體園區 85 25 2009-07-04 Nangang 南港展覽館 78 n/a 2009-07-04 == References == Category:Taipei Metro
